Kansas_City.The Shops on Blue Parkway: The Shops on Blue Parkway is a shopping center located in Kansas City, Missouri on Blue Parkway & Kensington. The location surrounds the area from Blue Parkway to 50th Terrace on the North/South and 4001 Blue Parkway to Elmwood Avenue on the West/East. It sits on the site of a flooded area near Brush Creek.
